base_description: Gray arch-shaped structure with two vertical legs.
part_description: Consists of one semicircular top and two rectangular legs. The top is positioned horizontally, connecting the two vertical legs. Each part is uniform in color and size, with the legs parallel and evenly spaced.
internal_interaction_description: The semicircular top serves as a connecting bridge between the two vertical legs, providing structural stability. The legs support the top, creating a balanced and symmetrical shape. This interaction allows the object to stand upright and maintain its form.
external_interaction_description: The arch structure can act as a passageway or decorative element in architectural settings. It can be positioned over pathways or entrances, allowing people to walk through or under it. Its design may also serve as a focal point or support for additional structures.
